SELECT mt_value.id value_id, mt_value.type_id, mt_type.name as type_code, mt_value.value, mt_value.name, mt_value.add_name1, mt_value.add_name2, mt_value.lang_id, mt_type.comment FROM Synship.com_mt_value mt_value, Synship.com_mt_type mt_type WHERE mt_value.type_id = mt_type.id ORDER BY mt_value.type_id, mt_value.id

SELECT mt_value.id, mt_value.channel_id, mt_value.type_id, mt_type.name as type_code, mt_value.value, mt_value.name, mt_value.add_name1, mt_value.add_name2, mt_value.lang_id, mt_type.comment, mt_value.display_order, case when mt_type.id = 53 then ct_cart.cart_type else null end as cartType FROM Synship.com_mt_value_channel mt_value inner join Synship.com_mt_type mt_type on mt_value.type_id = mt_type.id left join synship.ct_cart ct_cart on mt_value.value = ct_cart.cart_id and mt_value.type_id = 53 ORDER BY mt_value.type_id, mt_value.display_order, mt_value.value

select tm_carrier_channel.order_channel_id order_channel_id , tm_carrier_channel.carrier carrier , tm_carrier.api_url api_url , tm_carrier_channel.api_key api_key , tm_carrier_channel.api_user api_user , tm_carrier_channel.api_pwd api_pwd , tm_carrier_channel.card_number card_number , tm_carrier_channel.cusite cusite , tm_carrier_channel.cusname cusname , tm_carrier_channel.customer customer , tm_carrier.alias_name alias_name , tm_carrier_channel.wsdl_url wsdl_url , tm_carrier_channel.comments comments from Synship.tm_carrier join Synship.tm_carrier_channel on tm_carrier.carrier = tm_carrier_channel.carrier order by tm_carrier_channel.order_channel_id , tm_carrier_channel.carrier

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Synship.ct_cart (cart_id, name, short_name, description, platform_id, cart_type, created,modified, creater) VALUES (#{cart_id}, #{name}, #{short_name}, #{description}, #{platform_id}, #{cart_type}, now(),now(),#{modifier}) on duplicate key update name=#{name},short_name=#{short_name},description=#{description},platform_id=#{platform_id},cart_type=#{cart_type}, modified=now(),modifier=#{modifier}

INSERT INTO Synship.ct_cart (cart_id, name, short_name, description, platform_id, cart_type, created,modified, creater, active) VALUES (#{cart_id}, #{name}, #{short_name}, #{description}, #{platform_id}, #{cart_type}, now(),now(),#{modifier}, 1)
mapper.update: update Synship.ct_cart set active=0 and modifier=#{modifier} and modified=now() where cart_id=#{cart_id}
